\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 80720}

\subsection*{Drag}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Kamikaze}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 20 mg & oral & Pharms - Zolpidem & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 10 mg & insufflated & Pharms - Zolpidem & ground / crushed\\
\hline
 T+ 0:15 & 1 cig. & smoked & Tobacco - Cigarettes & leaves\\
\hline
 T+ 0:15 & 1 cup & oral & Coffee & liquid\\
\hline
 T+ 0:30 & 1 cup & oral & Coffee & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
T+00 I injested 2 ambien 10mg pills and snorted one 10mg pill.              



T+0015 begininng to feel slightly euphoric so I decide its time to light up a smoke as well as injest 1 cup of coffee. The tobacco smoked cleaner than usual in my inebriated state.



T+0030 I'm beginning to feel a bit light headed and seem to be dragging ass so I injest a second cup of my colombian brew only to bring myself back to the euphoric state. 



T+0045 I have the irresistable urge to take the Cosby kids down to the river the act was more explosive then most of my past trials.



T+0130 I'm begginng to notice the walls breathing and things going on in my periphrael I decide to try to sleep.



I woke up at 5am with to recollection how I made it upstairs to bed probably the amnesia affects. In short I find out that ambien really doesn't do a whole lot for me though I will still routinely take this amount in hopes of something interesting happening
